📑  &nbsp; **How should this be tested?**

```
1. Checkout branch
2. `npm run bootstrap`
3. `npm run test:unit`
```

> These testing instructions assume that you've already setup the LSP in your IDE with the `example` app. If you haven't then follow the instructions in the `README.md`.
